Uses of Class
org.netbeans.spi.search.SearchScopeDefinition

  • Packages that use SearchScopeDefinition 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.search.ui
    Helpers for creating UI controls for your search provider that are similar to controls in the default provider.
    org.netbeans.spi.search
    This package contains classes that you can subclass and register to lookups of nodes if you want to specify how the nodes should be searched.

    • Uses of SearchScopeDefinition in org.netbeans.api.search.ui

      Methods in org.netbeans.api.search.ui with parameters of type SearchScopeDefinition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ScopeController ComponentUtils.adjustComboForScope(JComboBox jComboBox, String preferredScopeId, SearchScopeDefinition... extraSearchScopes)
      Adjust a JComboBox to act as component for selecting search scope, and return a controller object for interacting with it.
